attributes.action: Give Undergraduate student(international) permission to bring their wife in uk
attributes.background: Almost all of the undergraduate student are over 21 . And some of them are got married. It difficult for them to live long time without their wife for long time (3/4 years) . So please allow them to bring their wife here.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about rights for partners to join their spouse in the UK, but it's not clear exactly what immigration rules you want to change.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petition about reducing the requirements for spousal visas, which you might like to sign:

Bring Partner and Spouse Visa Requirements in Line with BNO Visas: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577594
